@arham_4 wrote:

Why not just make an array or enum instead of making those ifs?

To your question:

tyb97:

if (System.currentTimeMills() - delay >= 1500) {}//1500 = 1.5 seconds.

item.title: 317 need one part added to my thieving code
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

I’m looking for a pause to add cause I can spam click the stalls and it just keeps giving me money how do i pause it so people can’t spam click it
heres my thieving stall code

if(objectID == 2561 && playerLevel[17] >= 0){ //bakery stall sM("You stole 1k."); addSkillXP(180, 17); addItem(995, 1000); setAnimation(0x340); } if(objectID == 2563 && playerLevel[17] >= 20){ //fur stall sM("You stole 5k."); addSkillXP(500, 17); addItem(995, 5000); setAnimation(0x340); } if(objectID == 2560 && playerLevel[17] >= 45){ //silk stall sM("You stole 10k."); addSkillXP(1560, 17); addItem(995, 10000); setAnimation(0x340); } if(objectID == 2565 && playerLevel[17] >= 70){ //silver stall sM("You stole 50k."); addSkillXP(5240, 17); addItem(995, 50000); setAnimation(0x340); } if(objectID == 2562 && playerLevel[17] >= 90){ //gem stall sM("You stole 100k."); addSkillXP(25600, 17); addItem(995, 100000); setAnimation(0x340); }

this is a delta

Read full topic
